post.title: seems t-mobile samsung vibrant can work on the big 3's 3g network
post.content: i found an interesting thread in xda developer site. someone there with an unlocked vibrant got 3g on att. i think att is using the same 3g bands as big3s. i have no intention to leave wind but it's nice to have a choice. it seems this phone is more capable than the official spec. tells us.
